name: Paint Target Strike
description:
Paint Target Strike is a new drag-swipe game which is very addictive and keep you engaged for hours.

Paint target strike game has a different types of strikers that are to be aim avoiding different obstacles and shoot them into the hole.

*** HOW TO PLAY ***
1. Drag the striker on the screen.
2. Swipe to aim the hole.
3. Leave the finger to shoot the striker towards the hole.
4. Note that you are allowed only once at a time to put the striker in the hole.

Download the game today and get addicted to the new hyper casual game.
